GSD.description:
fs/ntfs3: Validate index root when initialize NTFS security

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.17 by commit 24ee53c6bce15500db22f2a7aee9dd830e806c90. For more details please see the references link.
